definition: to step across/to stride over/to straddle/to span

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多数跨国公司都在把生产设备迁出日本。

sentences.english: I work for a branch in Xiamen of a multi-national company.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个跨国公司的厦门分公司工作。

sentences.english: Most transnational corporations engaged in food marketing have done both.
sentences.chinese: 大多数从事食品营销的跨国公司都在双管齐下。

sentences.english: Globalization also means the development of multinational corporations and transnational corporations.
sentences.chinese: 全球化包括多国公司和跨国公司的成长。

sentences.english: Can the sole proprietorship tendency of the transnational companies in China be reversed?
sentences.chinese: 在华跨国公司的独资化倾向有可能被扭转吗？

sentences.english: I work for a large multinational company called DAK Group.
sentences.chinese: 我在为一个叫DAK集团的大型跨国公司工作。

sentences.english: Several other international companies have also broken their leases, say property agents.
sentences.chinese: 据房产经济介绍，其他几个跨国公司也已撕毁租约。

sentences.english: Eight of the survey's top 10 most-admired multinationals are technology companies.
sentences.chinese: 在十大最受尊敬的跨国公司中，有8家是科技公司。

sentences.english: Multinational companies are unethically exploiting the plant genetic resources of developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司无道德地开发发展中国家的植物基因资源。

sentences.english: Several multi-national corporations are located in the new district of Pudong.
sentences.chinese: 数家跨国公司位于浦东新区。

sentences.english: The conventional approach of multinational companies has been to operate at the global tier of the product and talent markets.
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司往往只考虑产品和人才市场的全球层次。

sentences.english: But much of the venom in the press, at any rate, is directed at big multinationals.
sentences.chinese: 然，媒体的许多恶意中伤，矛头直指大的跨国公司。

sentences.english: A large numbers of international well-known multinational companies had invested in TEDA.
sentences.chinese: 一大批国际著名跨国公司都在天津开发区投资。

sentences.english: A favorable aspect about MNCs is that they reate jobs in foreign countries.
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司在国外提供就业机会，这是它受欢迎的一面。

sentences.english: Multinationals are hoarding their cash and cutting back on construction of new factories.
sentences.chinese: 跨国公司正在持币观望，削减新建工厂。

sentences.english: OJSC "MMC" Norilsk Nickel" is a classic transnational company.
sentences.chinese: 诺里尔斯克镍业是一家典型的跨国公司。

definition: abbr. for 外商獨資企業|外商独资企业[wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4]
foreign enterprise/company established in mainland China with direct investment from foreign entities or from investors in Taiwan, Macao or Hong Kong/abbr. for 外資企業|外资企业
wholly foreign-owned enterprise (WFOE) (form of legal entity in China)/abbr. to 外資企業|外资企业[wai4 zi1 qi3 ye4]
pinyin: wai4 shang1 du2 zi1 qi3 ye4

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
